title: Whistlestop: Live Book Tour Mashup
description:
John Dickerson is live on the road in New York and San Francisco sharing snipets and highlights from the newly published Whistlestop book.
Love Slate podcasts? Listen longer with Slate Plus! Members get bonus segments, ad-free versions, exclusive podcasts, and more. Start your 2-week free trial at slate.com/podcastsplus.
